issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I have an error recurred with titanium, such ask picture below; 
I try to run my app but it always show that error .

Please have me solve problems like that . 
Thank you !
fields.environment: Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting this issue. We need more information to troubleshoot this issue. I would appreciate if you can attach the Studio log files to this ticket. You can see the Studio log files by using the following menu:

Help => Studio => View Log File

Resolving this ticket as we have not been able to reproduce the issue and we have not received the requested information from the reporter. We would be happy to reopen the ticket and investigate it further if you can provide the requested log files.
